snippet: With spring break over, lawmakers — rather than their staff members — will be handling hard negotiations on gun safety and immigration reform.

byline.original: By JONATHAN WEISMAN and JENNIFER STEINHAUER

lead_paragraph: With spring break over, lawmakers — rather than their staff members — will be handling hard negotiations on gun safety and immigration reform.

headline.seo: Congress Returns, With Focus on Guns and Immigration Legislation
headline.main: Critical Week in Senate for Gun and Immigration Bills
